overview: Petite Japanese masseuse Marica Hase doesn't speak a word of English, and her client Justin Hunt can't understand his service options. She undresses her client and removes her traditional kimono robe, surprising Justin with her nudity. He follows her into the shower where she washes his body and gently strokes his cock. Carmen Valentina is working at the Nuru Massage Spa today when she suddenly looks up and is met with her Russian teacher John Strong staring her straight in the face. He barely recognizes her from his Russian class, and is surprised that anyone would be working at Nuru while going through school. Logan Long had a tough night at the club the night before. Despite doing everything in his power, he couldn't just seal the deal and bring a girl home. Not wanting another disappointing night, he calls his favorite massage parlor to see if they can come by.
title: An Oily Surprise
